mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product_sell_daily (product_id, shop_id, create_time, total) (SELECT product_id, shop_id, date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d'), count(product_id) AS total FROM tb_user_product_map /* 统计每个店铺的每件商品的日销量是多少(不统计当天) */ WHERE date_format(tb_user_product_map.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY tb_user_product_map.product_id)

INSERT INTO tb_product_sell_daily (product_id, shop_id, create_time, total) (SELECT p.product_id, p.shop_id, date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), 0 AS total FROM tb_product p WHERE p.product_id NOT IN ( SELECT product_id FROM tb_product_sell_daily WHERE date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)))
mapper.select:
SELECT psd.product_sell_daily_id, psd.create_time, psd.total, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, p.product_id, p.product_name FROM tb_product_sell_daily psd, tb_shop s, tb_product p
psd.shop_id = s.shop_id and psd.product_id = p.product_id
and psd.shop_id = #{productSellDailyCondition.shop.shopId}
and p.product_name like '%${productSellDailyCondition.product.productName}%'
and date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY psd.product_id, psd.create_time
